name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Exploit
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable scripting interface, executing malicious commands to gain unauthorized access and attack the internal network.

action--7e4c9ad6-22a6-4f8b-a1ec-c878e4d7.name: Remove unauthorized scripts
action--7e4c9ad6-22a6-4f8b-a1ec-c878e4d7.description: Remove any unauthorized scripts detected on the system.

action--a6da8e59-8a4d-4605-8e52-e8518eab.name: Kill malicious process
action--a6da8e59-8a4d-4605-8e52-e8518eab.description: Terminate any processes that are executing malicious commands.

action--c88aeccb-3d76-4c77-9b8c-715af7a5.name: Block outgoing traffic to malicious IP
action--c88aeccb-3d76-4c77-9b8c-715af7a5.description: Block any outgoing traffic to the known malicious IP address detected.

while-condition--5e698bca-3f43-4482-aa23.name: Perform system integrity checks
while-condition--5e698bca-3f43-4482-aa23.description: Check for system integrity and potential infections in a loop.

action--c5a61b48-79c6-456b-bf59-f5d4427a.name: Restore modified system files
action--c5a61b48-79c6-456b-bf59-f5d4427a.description: Restore any modified system files to their original state.
